message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $165.
I appreciate the compromise, but $165 is still a little out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $155, which is closer to your budget and still a good deal for me.
